Summary: Kyiv region - the threat of attack UAVs!

Shahed over Zaporizhzhia!
? Attention! The activity of enemy tactical aviation in the north-eastern direction! The threat of using aviation means of destruction!

UAVs in Kharkiv Oblast are moving west towards Poltava Oblast. Unmanned aerial vehicle in Sumy Oblast in the Lebedyn area, heading north-west. Unmanned aerial vehicle in the south of Poltava region, heading north-west. UAV from Dnipropetrovsk region in the direction of Poltava/Cherka region. New unmanned aerial vehicles in the Kherson region are heading towards the Mykolaiv region from the east.

UAVs in the Kharkiv Region are moving on a north-westerly course. BpLA in Zaporizhzhia, course north-west. UAV from Dnipropetrovsk region in the direction of Poltava/Cherka region. UAVs in Kherson region are heading towards Mykolaiv region from the east.
Dnipro and Pavlograd, BpLA in your direction from the east. Stay in shelters.
